foreignBusinessTypeIds.description: Which of the following are **true** about your business? **Select all that apply.**

optionContent.operationsInNJ: Part of my `business operations|nexus-business` takes place in New Jersey
optionContent.employeesInNJ: I have employees who live in New Jersey
optionContent.transactionsInNJ: I have more than 200 separate taxable transactions in New Jersey in the current or prior calendar year
optionContent.revenueInNJ: My taxable transactions in New Jersey exceeded $100,000 in the last calendar year

nexusLocationInNewJersey.header: Will you own or lease commercial or manufacturing space in New Jersey?
nexusLocationInNewJersey.errorTextRequired: Please select whether you will have a New Jersey location
nexusLocationInNewJersey.radioButtonYesText: Yes, I will own or lease space in New Jersey
nexusLocationInNewJersey.radioButtonNoText: No, I will not own or lease space in New Jersey
